setting.title: Settings
setting.unavailable: In development, the following features are temporarily unavailable
setting.modTargetPath-info: The mod target directory is where modLoader reads mods, usually the Mods folder
setting.modSourcePath-info: The mod source directory is where the program stores mods. When a mod is enabled, a link will be created from here to the mod target directory
setting.presetPath-info: The preset path is where presets are stored. A preset is a collection of mods that can be enabled with one click

modInfo.emptyTitle: Click on a mod card to view detailed information

editDialog.mod-info-name-tip: The Mod name is the folder name, click the button to go to the folder to modify
editDialog.mod-info-character-tip: The character name is the character name in the mod, the program classifies and displays according to this name, of course, it is not necessarily the character name, it can also be other classification names, such as 'tools', 'mise', etc.
editDialog.mod-info-image-tip: The MOD cover is used to display the mod, click the button to select the cover image
editDialog.mod-info-url-tip: Used to record the source address of the mod, convenient for tracking updates and sharing
editDialog.mod-info-hotkeys-tip: Hotkeys supported by the mod, used to switch the mod status
editDialog.mod-info-description-tip: The MOD description is used to describe the mod, which can be used to record the author, version, etc.
